scripts.build:boot: rm -rf dist && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.boot.json && NODE_ENV=development yarn dream sync:existing
scripts.build: echo "building dream boot..." && yarn build:boot && echo "building dream..." && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json && yarn sync:package-json
scripts.build:boot-core: rm -rf dist && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.boot.json && yarn dream sync:config-cache --core && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.boot.json
scripts.build:core: yarn before:build:core && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.core.json && yarn after:build:core
scripts.before:build:core: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && yarn build:boot-core
scripts.after:build:core: cp .dream.yml dist/.dream.yml && mkdir dist/test-app/conf/env && cp test-app/conf/env/db.yml dist/test-app/conf/env/db.yml && yarn sync:package-json
scripts.spec: DREAM_CORE_DEVELOPMENT=1 yarn build:core && DREAM_CORE_DEVELOPMENT=1 yarn dream spec --core
scripts.postinstall: if [ ! -e .no-dream-postinstall ]; then NODE_ENV=development yarn dream sync:existing && yarn build; fi
